mapper.select: select * from notice order by write_time desc limit #{start}, 10
mapper.insert: insert into notice( title, content, writer, write_time, file_path, file_save_name, file_ori_name) values(#{title},#{content},#{writer},now(),#{file_path},#{file_save_name},#{file_ori_name})
mapper.update: update notice set hit=#{hit}+1 where notice_no=#{notice_no}
update notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, file_path=#{file_path}, file_save_name=#{file_save_name}, file_ori_name=#{file_ori_name} where notice_no=#{notice_no}
mapper.select: select * from notice where title like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') order by write_time desc limit #{start}, 10
select count(*) from notice where title like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')
